statements: SELECT * FROM user_authentication;
SELECT username, is_admin FROM user_authentication;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_authentication WHERE is_admin = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM user_authentication WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT user_id, password_hash FROM user_authentication WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM user_authentication WHERE is_admin = TRUE;
SELECT username, is_admin FROM user_authentication WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_authentication WHERE is_admin = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM user_authentication WHERE username LIKE 'a%';
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_authentication WHERE password_hash IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'a%';
SELECT user_id, password_hash FROM users WHERE email = 'example@example.com';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username='john_doe';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, email, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id WHERE role_name='admin';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM user_roles WHERE role_name='moderator');
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username='alice_smith' OR email='alice.smith@example.com';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email = 'example@example.com'
SELECT id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'user%'
SELECT role_name FROM roles
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT role_name FROM roles WHERE role_name = 'Admin';
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON r.role_id = ur.role_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE password IS NOT NULL AND email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, date_joined FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM roles WHERE role_name = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, balance FROM wallet_accounts WHERE active = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, password_hash, date_joined FROM users ORDER BY date_joined DESC;
SELECT users.username, roles.role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(account_id) AS num_accounts FROM users JOIN wallet_accounts ON users.user_id = wallet_accounts.user_id GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_accounts > 2;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, password_hash FROM users WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT role_name FROM user_roles ORDER BY role_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_role_mapping WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, password_hash FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_role_mapping urm ON u.user_id = urm.user_id JOIN user_roles r ON urm.role_id = r.role_id;

SELECT u.username, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_role_mapping urm ON u.user_id = urm.user_id JOIN user_roles r ON urm.role_id = r.role_id JOIN role_permission_mapping rpm ON r.role_id = rpm.role_id JOIN user_permissions p ON rpm.permission_id = p.permission_id;

SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_role_mapping urm ON u.user_id = urm.user_id JOIN user_roles r ON urm.role_id = r.role_id JOIN role_permission_mapping rpm ON r.role_id = rpm.role_id JOIN user_permissions p ON rpm.permission_id = p.permission_id WHERE u.user_id = 1;
